title: Virtual Page View Event Data
description: Data payload for the page.virtual_view event. Fired during client-side SPA navigation when the URL changes without a full page reload.

url.description: The full URL of the virtual page being navigated to.

path.description: The path portion of the virtual page URL (e.g. /products/shoes).

title.description: The document title of the virtual page.

previousUrl.description: The full URL of the page the user navigated from.

previousPath.description: The path portion of the previous page URL.
